text.section:
Each local jurisdiction shall adopt a plan that includes:
the elements required under Subtitle 1 of this title; and
the visions set forth in § 1-201 of this article.

section.section: Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, only a legislative body that has adopted a plan may adopt regulations implementing the visions stated in § 1-201 of this article in the plan.
This subsection does not limit the Department of Planning from exercising any authority granted under the State Finance and Procurement Article.
